about_the_game:
About This Game


Love Menu is a visual novel game that follows the romance between a young man and a waitress he meets at a local cafe. In addition to the immersive story and interactive choices that shape the course of their relationship, Love Menu also features a variety of fun mini-game events that are designed to enhance the characters and influence the relationship between the main character and the waitress.

Minigames


The mini-games provide a unique and interactive way to get to know the characters and their interests, and can have a direct impact on the main story. They add an extra layer of depth and immersion to the game and help to deepen the connection between the main character and the waitress.

Gameplay


Experience the thrilling journey of a man in love as he sets out to win the heart of the most beautiful waitress he's ever met.
Navigate through various scenarios and make decisions that will impact your progress towards achieving your goal. As you interact with her on a daily basis, your relationship will gradually evolve, unlocking new conversations and experiences.
Be mindful of your choices, as they will determine the outcome of your pursuit. Take advantage of every opportunity to earn points and advance to the next level.

Art

The art of Love Menu goes beyond the size of your screen. Use your mouse scroll to smoothly pan the image.


With beautiful artwork, an engaging soundtrack, and a variety of fun and meaningful mini-game events, Love Menu is a game that will keep you entertained and invested in the story of the main character and his beloved waitress.
If you are a fan of romance and visual novels with very hot scenes, do not miss this charming and heartwarming little story. Add Love Menu to your collection today and fall in love with this immersive and enjoyable gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is not suitable for minors due to its adult-only content. It contains scenes that are intended for an adult audience and may not be appropriate for children or young people. 
We recommend that only those who are of legal age and maturity level play this game.

name: Love Menu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Love Menu is a visual novel game about a romance between a young man and a waitress. It has immersive story, interactive choices, and mini-game events that enhance the characters and influence the relationship. The beautiful artwork will keep you entertained and invested in the story.
supported_languages:
English*, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
